Entries.Biography: Dylan (He/Him) is a more serious and reserved marine biologist. He moved to East Scarp one year prior to The Farmer with his brother, Eli. Dylan is asexual. His story involves building his confidence and exploring the deepest trenches of the Gem Sea. He lives under the watch of Thistle, a strange corvid on their roof.

Eli.Heading: Eli
Eli.Description: Dylan's brother, who is an overenthusiastic cryptozoologist.

Soot.Heading: Soot
Soot.Description: A Dust Sprite rescued from the mines that shares their home.

Thistle.Heading: Thistle
Thistle.Description: A strange corvid watching over Dylan from their roof.

Serious.Heading: Serious
Serious.Description: Known for being serious and reserved.

Entries.BiographyEnd: Dylan is not romanceable at this time.
